mapper.select: SELECT C.NO ,C.USER_NO ,C.TYPE_NO ,C.REV_NO ,C.TITLE ,C.CONTENT ,TO_CHAR(C.START_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS START_TIME ,TO_CHAR(C.END_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS END_TIME ,C.PLACE ,C.STATUS ,U.NAME ,CT.TYPE FROM CALENDAR C JOIN "USER" U ON C.USER_NO = U.NO JOIN CALENDAR_TYPE CT ON C.TYPE_NO = CT.NO WHERE C.USER_NO = 1
